other-integrations.name: Bash shell
other-integrations.description: Bash script for scanning a directory of code with the Veracode platform.

other-integrations.name: F5 WAF
other-integrations.description: Transforms Veracode dynamic result files into the F5 generic scanner result format for import into the F5 web application firewall.

other-integrations.name: verapi
other-integrations.description: Lambda function for automating Veracode static scans

other-integrations.name: veracode-api (Node)
other-integrations.description: Node.js package for automating Veracode scanning from the command line.

other-integrations.name: Veracode-cli
other-integrations.description: Automated way to check application status and DevSecops compliance.

other-integrations.name: VeraHooks Mitigation Webhooks
other-integrations.description: React .NET Core solution for creating custom webhooks that watch application profiles and trigger when mitigations meet specified conditions.
